item.title: 人们对通货膨胀的 "反核心 "感到愤怒
item.description:
小企业主的悲观情绪以及食品和燃料价格大幅飙升的后遗症将在 3 月份 CPI 之后长期存在。【原文：

The pessimism of small business owners and the aftermath of the huge spike in food and fuel prices will linger long after March CPI.

】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

item.title: 中国水泥生产商在 15 分钟内暴跌 99% 后暂停交易
item.description: 周三，中国一家水泥生产商暂停股票交易，成为市场关注的焦点，在上一交易日的最后 15 分钟内，该公司股票遭到抛售，市值几乎损失殆尽。【原文：A Chinese cement producer was in the spotlight after it suspended stock trading Wednesday, following a selloff that nearly wiped out all its market value in the final 15 minutes of the previous session.】

item.title: 惠誉将中国债务稳步增长的前景展望降至负面
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司将中国长期外债的评级展望从 "稳定 "下调至 "负面"，理由是中国公共财政前景面临的风险不断增加。【原文：Fitch Ratings revised the outlook on China’s long-term foreign debt to negative from stable, citing increasing risks to the country’s public finance prospects.】

item.title: 3 月通胀数据将延长美联储降息时间的戏剧化进程
item.description: 周三将公布的消费者物价月度报告不太可能解决围绕美联储何时降息的争论，预测者预计，在年初通胀读数升高之后，物价将有所回落。【原文：A monthly report on consumer prices due Wednesday is unlikely to settle the debate around the timing of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts, with forecasters expecting some moderation following elevated inflation readings at the start of the year.】

item.title: 国防股震荡引发对估值过高的担忧
item.description:
在欧洲领导人加强呼吁提高军费开支后，投资者今年仍坐拥300亿美元的收益。【原文：

Investors are still sitting on $30 billion of gains this year after European leaders stepped up calls to boost military spending.

】

item.title: 监管机构释放养老金现金，推动俄罗斯首次公开募股
item.description: 随着当局计划为养老基金投资小型交易开绿灯，俄罗斯首次公开募股（IPO）市场将加速复苏。【原文：The revival of Russia’s IPO market is set to accelerate as authorities plan to give pension funds the green light to invest in smaller deals.】

item.title: 微软日本投资推动电力和工业股上涨
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）计划投资 29 亿美元，在日本推广超大规模云计算和人工智能基础设施，这使得日本的公用事业股和工业股大幅上扬。【原文：Microsoft Corp.’s plan to invest $2.9 billion to boost hyperscale cloud computing and artificial intelligence infrastructure in Japan sent the country’s utility and industrial shares jumping.】

item.title: 对干预措施的押注助长了日本散户投资者的日元买盘
item.description: 随着日元接近 34 年来的最低点，有关可能进行干预的猜测正在东京的货币市场上蔓延。其中一个群体坚信干预会发生，那就是国内散户投资者。【原文：As the yen trades near a 34-year low, speculation over possible intervention is consuming Tokyo’s currency markets. One group is confident it will happen — domestic retail investors.】

item.title: 恒生中国股票指数较今年低点上涨 20
item.description: 由于经济数据向好，投资者情绪有所改善，在香港上市的中国股票的一个重要指标从今年的低点反弹。【原文：A key gauge of Hong Kong-listed Chinese shares extended a rebound from this year’s low, as investor sentiment improves with upbeat economic data.】

item.title: 上田称日本央行不会改变政策直接应对日元疲软
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，日本央行不会直接因货币走势而改变政策。【原文：Governor Kazuo Ueda said the Bank of Japan won’t change policy in direct response to currency moves, a comment that comes as market players await US inflation data that may tip the yen past a threshold risking currency intervention by Japan’s government.】

item.title: 基金经理称黄金的垂直上升期尚未结束
item.description: 接受彭博社采访的宏观基金经理表示，黄金连续创下历史新高的涨势尚未结束，自2月中旬以来推动黄金飙升近20%的因素有望推动黄金进一步上涨。【原文：Gold’s rally to successive all-time highs isn’t over, according to macro fund managers interviewed by Bloomberg, with the factors that have powered a near-20% surge since mid-February expected to fuel more gains.】

item.title: 新西兰维持利率不变，认为仍需采取紧缩政策
item.description: 新西兰央行连续第六次会议维持利率不变，并表示利率需要在一段时间内保持高位，以确保通货膨胀得到控制。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank kept interest rates unchanged for a sixth straight meeting and said they need to remain high for some time to ensure inflation is tamed.】

item.title: 德国林德纳公司希望在 2035 年后有更多内燃机可供选择
item.description: 德国财政部长克里斯蒂安-林德纳（Christian Lindner）正在重新讨论欧盟关于在 2035 年禁止销售新型内燃机汽车的决定，并寻求比使用可再生电力和从大气中捕获的二氧化碳制成的燃料更多的例外情况。【原文：German Finance Minister Christian Lindner is resurrecting the debate on the European Union’s decision to ban sales of new combustion engine cars in 2035, seeking more exceptions than the one granted for fuels made using renewable electricity and carbon dioxide captured from the atmosphere.】

item.title: 奇特公司债务产品吸引渴望收益的印度储蓄者
item.description: 印度的一些个人投资者正在探索该国信贷市场的一个新兴领域，以追求更高的回报。【原文：Some individual investors in India are exploring a nascent segment of the nation’s credit market in pursuit of higher returns.】

item.title: 在关键的美国通胀数据公布前，黄金创历史新高
item.description: 黄金创下历史新高，因为投资者在等待美国通胀数据，这些数据可能有助于美联储对利率前景的判断。【原文：Gold held a record high as investors positioned for US inflation data that could help shape the Federal Reserve’s outlook on interest rates.】

item.title: 中国管理人民币的工具有哪些？快速浏览
item.description: 监督中国人民银行如何处理其外汇市场的 "有管理的浮动汇率 "系统并非易事。央行掌握着各种工具--有些比较透明，比如每日参考汇率，而有些则很模糊，比如中国当局可能暗中敦促银行不要在自营交易中对人民币下注。人民币正在向其允许交易区间的末端疲软滑落，因此当局可能加大力度的风险正在上升。【原文：Monitoring how the People’s Bank of China handles its “managed float” system for the foreign-exchange market isn’t easy. The central bank has various tools at its disposal - some are more transparent, like the daily reference rate, while others are murky, such as the potential for Chinese authorities to secretly urge banks not to bet against the yuan in proprietary trading. The currency is slipping toward weak end of its allowed trading band, so risks are rising that the authorities may step up】

item.title: 中国拖累市场，全球风险投资资金下降 30
item.description: 第一季度，全球风险投资资金下降了 30%，继续低迷，原因是投资者在经济衰退和股市低迷的情况下保持谨慎。【原文：Global venture capital funding declined 30% in the first quarter, continuing its slump as investors remain cautious amid sputtering economies and a sluggish market for stock-market debuts.】

item.title: Seven & I 回击伊藤洋华堂单位出售报道
item.description: Seven & i Holdings Co.下跌，因为该公司称 "没有事实支持 "有关其计划上市或出售旗下超市部门伊藤洋华堂部分股权的报道，面对折扣店和在线零售商日益加剧的竞争，伊藤洋华堂一直面临重组压力。【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co. fell after the company said there were “no facts to support” reports that it plans to list or sell part of its supermarket unit Ito-Yokado, which has been under pressure to restructure in the face of intensifying competition from discount stores and online retailers.】

item.title: 中国石油将建立液化天然气船队并扩大全球贸易
item.description: 中国最大的天然气供应商中国石油天然气集团公司（China National Petroleum Corp.【原文：China National Petroleum Corp., the country’s biggest natural gas supplier, will build more ships to carry the fuel as it looks to enhance its role as a global gas trader.】

item.title: 香港考虑修改税收规则以吸引私人信贷业务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港政府正在考虑制定新的税收规则，为包括私人信贷和基础设施在内的热门另类投资提供更优惠的待遇。【原文：Hong Kong’s government is considering new tax rules that would give more favorable treatment to popular alternative investments including private credit and infrastructure, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。华尔街交易员正在等待一份关键的通胀报告。日本敦促美国增加投资。英特尔推出新芯片挑战英伟达。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Wall Street traders await a key inflation report. Japan urges the US to boost investments. Intel rolls out a new chip to challenge Nvidia. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 报告显示美国库存增加，原油维持两日跌势
item.description: 在一份行业报告指出美国原油库存增加之后，石油维持了连续两天的跌势，尽管中东地区一触即发的紧张局势预计会抑制跌幅。【原文：Oil held a two-day decline after an industry report pointed to a gain in US crude stockpiles, although simmering tensions in the Middle East are expected to cap losses.】

item.title: 日本在 MSCI 权重中领先中国的比例升至五年新高
item.description: 日本股市的一轮牛市使该国在亚洲基准中相对于中国同业的权重上升到2018年底的水平，凸显出投资者对这两个巨大市场的偏好发生了变化。【原文：A bull run in Japanese stocks has boosted the nation’s weight on an Asian benchmark versus Chinese peers to levels last seen in late 2018, underscoring a shift in investors’ preference between the two giant markets.】

item.title: 美国通胀前亚洲股市将偏高：市场综述
item.description: 在美国股市回升和债券攀升之后，亚洲股市多数走高，此前将公布关键的通胀数据，这将有助于确定美联储下一步行动的前景。【原文：Stocks in Asia mostly pointed higher after US equities recovered and bonds climbed ahead of key inflation data that will help shape the outlook for the Federal Reserve’s next steps.】

item.title: 萨巴 ETF 大举进军股票型封闭式基金，觊觎大幅折扣
item.description: 萨巴资本管理公司（Saba Capital Management）的一只追踪封闭式基金行业的主动管理型 ETF 正在加仓股票型产品，该公司称，这些产品提供了一些最大的折扣和令人信服的风险调整回报。【原文：A Saba Capital Management actively-managed ETF tracking the closed-end fund industry is loading up on equity-focused products that the firm says offer some of the largest discounts and compelling risk-adjusted returns.】

item.title: 大量空头押注使债券面临后CPI挤压
item.description: 在一份关键的通胀报告公布之前，国债交易员们已经变得非常看空，以至于如果通胀数据不尽如人意，他们就有可能受到挤压。【原文：Treasury bond traders have turned so bearish ahead of a key inflation report that they risk getting squeezed on a less than red-hot reading.】

item.title: 投资者为秘鲁 70 亿美元养老金提取法案做好准备
item.description: 投资者担心，允许秘鲁人动用其退休储蓄的提案可能会迫使养老基金出售资产，以便腾出多达 70 亿美元的资金用于提取。【原文：Investors fear a proposal that would allow Peruvians to tap their retirement savings could force pension funds to sell assets in order to make as much as $7 billion available for withdrawal.】

item.title: S&P因纽约州敦刻尔克的金融风险而下调评级，随后又撤销评级
item.description: 纽约州敦刻尔克市（Dunkirk）是一个拥有约 13,000 人口的城市，正在寻求州政府的帮助以弥补运营和资本基金赤字，S&P 全球评级公司将其信用评级下调了三个等级，降至最低投资级别。【原文：Dunkirk, New York, a city of about 13,000 seeking state help to close operating and capital fund deficits, had its credit rating slashed three notches by S&P Global Ratings to the lowest investment grade.】

item.title: 梅西百货因在代理权争夺战中威胁加快债务偿还而被起诉
item.description: 一家养老基金在起诉梅西百货公司时声称，梅西百货公司将其债务协议 "武器化"，作为与两家投资公司代理权争夺战的一部分，使其财务未来面临风险。【原文：Macy’s Inc. has “weaponized” its debt agreements as part of a proxy fight with a pair of investment firms, putting its financial future at risk, a pension fund claimed in suing the retailer.】
